results.content: Although it does apply many concepts of nestjs shows how to intertwine various modules in a seemingly effective way. It could have been better by explaining "why are we doing, how we are doing". Docker part didn't work for me and I had to do my own research to get docker working with nestjs. Would have been bit better if docker included multipart build stages.
results.content_html: Although it does apply many concepts of nestjs shows how to intertwine various modules in a seemingly effective way. It could have been better by explaining "why are we doing, how we are doing". Docker part didn't work for me and I had to do my own research to get docker working with nestjs. Would have been bit better if docker included multipart build stages.

results.content: One of the best courses I've seen on udemy. Thanks for sharing your knowledge
